name: GCH Craftsman Grill
location: Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & Spa, Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & Spa

items.title: Smoked Salmon Bagel Sandwich
items.description: with Caper Cream Cheese, Arugula, Roasted Tomato and Red Onions on a Toasted Plain Bagel, served with Seasonal Fruit

items.title: Breakfast Sandwich*
items.description: Scrambled Eggs, Bacon, Cheddar, Smoked Paprika Aïoli, Avocado and Waffled Hash Brown on a Croissant Bun, served with a House Salad

items.title: American Breakfast*
items.description: Scrambled Eggs, Bacon or Sausage, Fruit or Breakfast Potatoes and Choice of Toast: White, Wheat or Sourdough

items.title: Farmer’s Market Frittata*
items.description: Eggs, Ham, Spinach, House-blend Cheese, Onions, Asparagus, Bell Peppers, Roasted Vine Tomato and Lemon Hollandaise, served with a House Salad

items.title: Breakfast Burrito*
items.description: Eggs, Bacon, Potato, Pico de Gallo and Shredded Cheese in a Flour Tortilla with Salsa Roja and Sour Cream

items.title: Avocado Toast on Sourdough*
items.description: Grilled Sourdough, Avocado, Poached Eggs, Ricotta, Chives, Crispy Garlic, Honey, Basil and Lemon Oil

items.title: Brioche French Toast
items.description: Thick-sliced Brioche with Vanilla Sweetened Mascarpone, Fresh Berries, Powdered Sugar and Blueberry Compote

items.title: Belgian Waffle
items.description: Inquire with Cashier

items.title: Power Pack
items.description: A Cuties® Mandarin Orange, a Yogurt Smoothie, Carrots and Whole-Grain "Fish" Crackers served with choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Kid's Breakfast Plate*
items.description: Scrambled Eggs, Turkey Bacon and Waffled Hash Browns with choice of Seasonal Fruit or Lowfat Yogurt and small Lowfat Milk or small Dasani® Water. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Kid’s Mickey-shaped Waffle
items.description: dusted with Powdered Sugar and served with Syrup and choice of small Lowfat Milk or small Dasani® Water

items.title: Poke Bowl*
items.description: Choice of Sushi-grade Ahi Tuna or Salmon tossed in Citrus Ponzu with Cucumber, Edamame, Avocado, Crab Salad, Green Onions, Radicchio, Pickled Seaweed, Furikake and Spicy Aïoli, with choice of Calrose Rice or Mixed Greens

items.title: Avocado Panzanella
items.description: Avocado, Sourdough Bread, Baby Heirloom Tomatoes, Assorted Mediterranean Olives, Feta, Arugula and Charred Onion Chimichurri

items.title: Baked Nachos
items.description: Choice of Shredded Beef or Chicken, Tortilla Chips, Cheese Sauce, Shredded Cheese, Black Beans, Green Onions, Pickled Jalapeños, Cilantro, Queso Fresco, Avocado, Crema and Salsa Roja

items.title: Carne Asada Quesadilla
items.description: Grilled Carne Asada with Melted Cheese, Roasted Corn Relish, Black Beans and Green Onions, wrapped in a Flour Tortilla with Chipotle Crema, Fresno Chile, Cilantro and Limes

items.title: Shrimp Ceviche*
items.description: Marinated Shrimp, Spicy Citrus Broth, White Onion, Tomato, Cucumber, Avocado and Cilantro, served with Tortilla Chips

items.title: Angus Burger*
items.description: Cilantro-Mint Aïoli, White Onion, Grafton Smoked Cheddar, Iceberg Lettuce, Pickles and Tomato on a Brioche Bun, served with Fries

items.title: Sticky Chicken Wings
items.description: White Rice, Gochujang BBQ Sauce, Aleppo Spice, Pickled Cucumber Slaw, Toasted Sesame Seeds and Green Onions

items.title: Flat Iron Steak Salad*
items.description: Kale and Romaine, Avocado, Corn, Jicama, Cherry Tomatoes, Cilantro, Aleppo Spice, Crispy Tortilla Strips, Toasted Pepitas and Queso Fresco, with Greek Yogurt Caesar Dressing (Substitute Salmon or Chicken)

items.title: Salmon Salad*
items.description: Salmon Fillet, Cucumber, Avocado, Tomato, Sweet Peppers, Farro, Charred Green Onions, Shallots, Valbreso Feta, Champagne Vinaigrette and Baby Kale (Substitute Flat Iron Steak or Chicken)

items.title: Hot Dog of the Month
items.description: inquire with a Cashier

items.description: Roasted Mushrooms, Plant-based Sausage, Mushroom Spread, Caramelized Onions, Green Onions, Fresh Mozzarella and Artisan Cheese Blend

items.title: Charcuterie Pizza
items.description: Premium Pepperoni, Prosciutto, Sausage, Arugula, Fire-roasted Tomatoes and Artisan Cheese Blend

items.title: Classic Sundae
items.description: Vanilla Ice Cream, Chocolate Sauce, Chantilly Cream and Toasted Almonds, topped with a Cherry

items.title: Apple Galette
items.description: Caramel Ice Cream, Vanilla sauce and Powdered Sugar

items.title: Power Pack
items.description: A Cuties® Mandarin Orange, a Yogurt Smoothie, Carrots and Whole-Grain "Fish" Crackers served with choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Hamburger
items.description: served with a Cuties® Mandarin Orange, a Yogurt Smoothie and choice of small Dasani® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.description: served with Seasonal Fruit or French Fries and a choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk
